alert.note: Alert for Kendall; Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 12:59AM CDT until June 25 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Kendall County in northeastern Illinois... Northwestern Will County in northeastern Illinois... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1259 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yorkville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Aurora, Joliet, Naperville, Bolingbrook, Romeoville, Plainfield, Oswego, Yorkville, Plano, Crest Hill, Montgomery, Shorewood, Boulder Hill, Rockdale, Crystal Lawns, Millbrook and Bristol. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 252 and 265. I-80 between mile markers 129 and 132. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
